means: 没收（财产），征用( expropriate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The Bolsheviks expropriated the property of the landowners.
sentence.Network_cn: 布尔什维克征收了地主的财产。

sentence.Network_en: The local government expropriated all the trucks and tractors during the flood.
sentence.Network_cn: 洪水期间当地政府征用了所有的卡车和拖拉机.

sentence.Network_en: The new government expropriated his estate for military purposes.
sentence.Network_cn: 新政府将他的地产徵作军用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He expropriated my ideas for his own article ., 他剽窃我的观点来写他的文章.
Under the leadership of the Party , the peasants expropriated their own lands from the landlords ., 在党的领导下 , 农民从地主手里夺回自己的土地.

list.abs: 国际市场营销专业术语 - 豆丁网 ... exporting 出口 expropriation 征用 F facilitating function 便利功能.
征收（EXPROPRIATION）：在国有化下之特别案件上，征收是被允许，其不仅符合宪法第40条，也合乎国际原则，同时也承认对此 …
会计词汇D ... land development 土地开发 land expropriation 土地征用 land law 土地法.
Lagrangian Multiplier 拉氏乘数Land expropriation statute 土地征收条例Land use characteristic 土地使用特性
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... appropriate v 拨款；挪用 expropriate v 没收，征用 propriety n 适当；礼节.

entry.def: If a government or other authority expropriates someone's property, they take it away from them for public use.

example.ex: The Bolsheviks expropriated the property of the landowners.
example.tran: 布尔什维克征收了地主的财产。

means.word_mean: 1. taken out of the possession of another and transferred to your own use often without permission;

sentences.sentence: "the expropriated land was developed into a public playground"

auth_sentence.content: I'd been forcibly expropriated from myself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd been forcibly expropriated from myself.

auth_sentence.content: The government seized property or in some cases outright expropriated companies.
auth_sentence.res_content: The government seized property or in some cases outright expropriated companies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government seized property or in some cases outright expropriated companies.

auth_sentence.content: A Royal Decree expropriated the land.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A Royal Decree expropriated the land.
